attributes.notes:
**Masterpiece! 10/10**

One of the best metroidvanias I've ever played. The atmosphere, music, art style, and challenging combat all come together perfectly.

**What made it special:**
- Every boss fight felt rewarding
- The lore is deep and mysterious
- Platforming mechanics are tight and responsive
- Grimm Troupe DLC was incredible

**Achievements:**
- Beat Radiance on first try (okay, maybe 50th try)
- 112% completion
- All charms collected
- Defeated Nightmare King Grimm

Definitely going back for the Godmaster DLC soon!
